definition: a group of organisms of the same type living or growing together
details:
noun
- a group of organisms of the same type living or growing together
- (microbiology) a group of organisms grown from a single parent cell
- a body of people who settle far from home but maintain ties with their homeland
= synonyms: settlement
- a geographical area politically controlled by a distant country
= synonyms: dependency
- a place where a group of people with the same interest or occupation are concentrated
= example: a place where a group of people with the same interest or occupation are concentrated
